StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetProgramCriteria]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @intProgramID int, @dtE.ec.veDate date.me ) AS
SELECT PROGRAM_ID, PROGRAM_CRITERIA_ED_DATE, GENDER, TERM_OF_ENLISTMENT, CITIZENSHIP, DRIVER_LICENSE, HIGHEST_WAIVER_LEVEL, HEIGHT_MINIMUM, HEIGHT_MAXIMUM, EDUCATION_TIER, AGE_MINIMUM, AGE_MAXIMUM, VISION_LEFT_UNCORRECTED, VISION_RIGHT_UNCORRECTED, VISION_LEFT_CORRECTED, VISION_RIGHT_CORRECTED, AFQT, GT, EL, PAOI, APT, EDPT, MM, WPMT, DLAB, CL, MEOP, COLOR_PERCEPTION, BONUS_AMOUNT, AmmoCanLi., Pullup, Pushup, Crunch, RunMinute, RunSecond, CYBER FROM MCRISS.dbo.PROGRAM_CRITERIA WHERE PROGRAM_ID = @intProgramID AND PROGRAM_CRITERIA_ED_DATE = @dtE.ec.veDate
